authorReco.reco

Class AuthorConfigurationFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • authorReco.reco.AuthorConfigurationFile

  • public class AuthorConfigurationFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract AuthorConfigurationFile: class representing a configuration file indicating the file paths of the author language models.
    Author:
    N. Hernandez and S. Quiniou (2017)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> authorNgramCountMap
      Map of ngram counter file paths associated with each author (each author can be associated with several language models).

      protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAuthors()
      Accessor to the authors of the authorNgramCountMap attribute.
      protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getNgramCountNames(java.lang.String author)

      Method returning a collection of language model file paths associated with an author.
      protected java.lang.String getNgramCountPath(java.lang.String author, java.lang.String ngramCountName)
      Accessor to the language model file path of a particular language model name in the authorNgramCountMap attribute.
      void loadNgramCountPath4Lang(java.lang.String configFile)
      Method parsing a configuration file where each line is a tuple in the following format: author ngramCountName ngramCountFilePath (each value is separated by a whitespace character; lines started with # are not considered) This method initialized the authorNgramCountMap attribute with the names and file paths of the language models used in the recognition system.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • authorNgramCountMap

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> authorNgramCountMap
        Map of ngram counter file paths associated with each author (each author can be associated with several language models). The keys to the first map are the first names of the authors in lowercase (e.g., "zola"), the keys to the second map are the names associated with each file containing a language model (e.g., "zola-bigrams"), and the values of the second map are the file paths associated with the given author name (e.g., "ngramCounts/zola-bigrams.lm").

    • Constructor Detail

        Constructor.

      • getAuthorNgramCountMap

        Accessor to the authorNgramCountMap attribute.
        Returns:
        the map of author file paths of the recognition system.

      • getAuthors

        protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAuthors()
        Accessor to the authors of the authorNgramCountMap attribute.
        Returns:
        the set of authors for which at least one file path is declared.

      • getNgramCountNames

        protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getNgramCountNames(java.lang.String author)
        Accessor to the language model names of a particular author in the authorNgramCountMap attribute.
        Parameters:
        author - the author to consider.
        Returns:
        the set of language model names for the given author.

      • getNgramCountPath

        protected java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getNgramCountPath(java.lang.String author)
        Method returning a collection of language model file paths associated with an author.
        Parameters:
        author - the author to consider.
        Returns:
        the collection of language model files for the given author.

      • getNgramCountPath

        protected java.lang.String getNgramCountPath(java.lang.String author,
                                             java.lang.String ngramCountName)
        Accessor to the language model file path of a particular language model name in the authorNgramCountMap attribute.
        Parameters:
        author - the author to consider.
        ngramCountName - the name of the language model to consider.
        Returns:
        the file path of the language model whose language and model name are given.

      • loadNgramCountPath4Lang

        public void loadNgramCountPath4Lang(java.lang.String configFile)
        Method parsing a configuration file where each line is a tuple in the following format: author ngramCountName ngramCountFilePath (each value is separated by a whitespace character; lines started with # are not considered) This method initialized the authorNgramCountMap attribute with the names and file paths of the language models used in the recognition system.
        Parameters:
        configFile - the file path of the configuration file containing the information on the language models (author, name and file path).
